tool_description: Natural language API to extract nutrition data from any text. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/nutrition.
title: Nutrition by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/nutrition

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query text to extract nutrition information (e.g. **bacon and 3 eggs**).

utterances.utterance: What is the nutritional information for a bowl of oatmeal with blueberries?

parameters.query: a bowl of oatmeal with blueberries

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the nutrition details for a grilled chicken salad?
Tell me the nutritional content of a smoothie made with banana, spinach, and almond milk.

parameters.query: smoothie made with banana, spinach, and almond milk

utterances.utterance: What are the nutrition facts for a cheeseburger with a side of fries?

parameters.query: cheeseburger with a side of fries

utterances.utterance: Provide the nutritional breakdown for a plate of spaghetti and meatballs.
What is the nutritional value of a veggie wrap with hummus?
Can you extract the nutrition data for a slice of pepperoni pizza?
What are the nutrition details for a bowl of lentil soup?
Tell me the nutritional content of a turkey sandwich with avocado.
What is the nutritional information for a cup of mixed nuts?
